scripts.package: rm -rf .electrify/.dist && electrify package -- --icon=./public/electron/icon.icns && path=./builds/$(date "+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M") && mkdir $path && electron-installer-dmg '.electrify/.dist/Be My Friend-darwin-x64/Be My Friend.app' 'Be My Friend' --icon=./public/electron/icon.icns --out=$path && say packaged
